__e: Bud and I are one girl who has had enough.
And Bud and I both thought that he was talking nonsense, but maybe he's more of a reliable witness than we realize.
On the other hand, I say there's nothing going on between you and Bud.
So you see, Bud, there's no reason why we can't be friends.
Bud didn't know everyone who was at your wedding, and he didn't have the list of names.
Oh, Bud, you haven't told me you love me in an awful long time.
